HOME.PRESENTATION: Competition reserved for electric vehicles, Albi Eco Race will be held from 5 to 8 May 2016 at the Albi circuit (Tarn). Three categories of vehicles will forward the potential of the electric energy in various forms (solar panels, hydrogen fuel cell).
